languages.text: {n}Вас вытягивают из небытия тупым, безжалостным укусом. Вы пытаетесь вдохнуть изо всех сил — и слышите свой надорванный хрип. Зрение постепенно возвращается, и из тумана выступает недовольная лошадиная морда. Вы вернулись. Вы живы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: Сквозь мть начинает проступать картинка: открываем глаза. Плохо видим. Чувствуем боль.

languages.text: {n}You are wrenched suddenly out of oblivion by a blunt, merciless bite. You try to breathe and hear your own ragged wheeze. Sight gradually returns to you, and an angry horse's head emerges from the mist. You are back. You are alive.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вас вытягивают из небытия тупым, безжалостным укусом. Вы пытаетесь вдохнуть изо всех сил — и слышите свой надорванный хрип. Зрение постепенно возвращается, и из тумана выступает недовольная лошадиная морда. Вы вернулись. Вы живы.{/n}

{n}You are wrenched suddenly out of oblivion by a blunt, merciless bite. You try to breathe and hear your own ragged wheeze. Sight gradually returns to you, and an angry horse's head emerges from the mist. You are back. You are alive.{/n}

languages.text: {n}突然之间，一阵无情的钝痛将你从虚无之中拖拽出来。你试着呼吸，随后听到了自己急促的喘息声。眼前的景象悠悠浮现，一张愤怒的马脸拨开了你眼前的迷雾。你回来了，你还活着。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are wrenched suddenly out of oblivion by a blunt, merciless bite. You try to breathe and hear your own ragged wheeze. Sight gradually returns to you, and an angry horse's head emerges from the mist. You are back. You are alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}突然之间，一阵无情的钝痛将你从虚无之中拖拽出来。你试着呼吸，随后听到了自己急促的喘息声。眼前的景象悠悠浮现，一张愤怒的马脸拨开了你眼前的迷雾。你回来了，你还活着。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El despiadado mordisco de unos dientes romos te arranca súbitamente del olvido. Intentas respirar y te oyes jadear casi sin resuello. Poco a poco tu vista se aclara, y lo primero que ves es la cabeza de un caballo enfurecido. Has vuelto. Estás {rt_mf|vivo|viva}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are wrenched suddenly out of oblivion by a blunt, merciless bite. You try to breathe and hear your own ragged wheeze. Sight gradually returns to you, and an angry horse's head emerges from the mist. You are back. You are alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El despiadado mordisco de unos dientes romos te arranca súbitamente del olvido. Intentas respirar y te oyes jadear casi sin resuello. Poco a poco tu vista se aclara, y lo primero que ves es la cabeza de un caballo enfurecido. Has vuelto. Estás {mf|vivo|viva}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kör, acımasız bir ısırıkla aniden hiçlikten çekiliyorsun. Nefes almaya çalışıyorsun ve kendi hırıltılı soluğunu duyuyorsun. Görüşün yavaş yavaş geri geliyor ve sisin içinde öfkeli bir at kafası beliriyor. Geri döndün. Hayattasın.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are wrenched suddenly out of oblivion by a blunt, merciless bite. You try to breathe and hear your own ragged wheeze. Sight gradually returns to you, and an angry horse's head emerges from the mist. You are back. You are alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kör, acımasız bir ısırıkla aniden hiçlikten çekiliyorsun. Nefes almaya çalışıyorsun ve kendi hırıltılı soluğunu duyuyorsun. Görüşün yavaş yavaş geri geliyor ve sisin içinde öfkeli bir at kafası beliriyor. Geri döndün. Hayattasın.{/n}

languages.text: {n}鈍い、容赦のない噛みつきによって突然に忘我状態から脱する。呼吸しようとして、自分の遅れてくる喘鳴を聞く。視界が徐々に戻り、怒った馬の頭が霧の中から現れる。あなたは戻ってきた。あなたは生きている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are wrenched suddenly out of oblivion by a blunt, merciless bite. You try to breathe and hear your own ragged wheeze. Sight gradually returns to you, and an angry horse's head emerges from the mist. You are back. You are alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}鈍い、容赦のない噛みつきによって突然に忘我状態から脱する。呼吸しようとして、自分の遅れてくる喘鳴を聞く。視界が徐々に戻り、怒った馬の頭が霧の中から現れる。あなたは戻ってきた。あなたは生きている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une morsure brutale et impitoyable vous arrache soudainement à l'oubli. Vous tentez de prendre une inspiration, et, ce faisant, entendez votre propre souffle saccadé. La vue vous revient peu à peu, et de la brume qui vous aveuglait émerge une tête de cheval en colère. Vous êtes de retour. Vous êtes en vie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are wrenched suddenly out of oblivion by a blunt, merciless bite. You try to breathe and hear your own ragged wheeze. Sight gradually returns to you, and an angry horse's head emerges from the mist. You are back. You are alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une morsure brutale et impitoyable vous arrache soudainement à l'oubli. Vous tentez de prendre une inspiration, et, ce faisant, entendez votre propre souffle saccadé. La vue vous revient peu à peu, et de la brume qui vous aveuglait émerge une tête de cheval en colère. Vous êtes de retour. Vous êtes en vie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mit einem Mal reißt dich ein gleichsam heftiger wie schmerzhafter Biss aus der Vergessenheit. Als du zu atmen versuchst, hörst dein eigenes röchelndes Keuchen. Langsam kannst du wieder etwas sehen. Aus dem Nebel taucht der Kopf eines wütenden Pferdes auf. Du bist zurück. Du lebst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are wrenched suddenly out of oblivion by a blunt, merciless bite. You try to breathe and hear your own ragged wheeze. Sight gradually returns to you, and an angry horse's head emerges from the mist. You are back. You are alive.{/n}

Langsam kannst du wieder etwas sehen. Aus dem Nebel taucht der Kopf eines wütenden Pferdes auf. Du bist zurück. Du lebst.{/n}
